transcript:
Customer: Haan, hello.
Executive: Haan sir, hello.
Customer: Rakhi Kul Sardar ji se baat ho rahi hai meri sir?
Executive: Haan ji sir, main aapko post din post.
Customer: Namaskar sir, kaise hain aap?
Executive: Sir, achha hoon main post din main aapko call kiya training ke liye. Call nahi koi uthaya.
Executive: Parso sir actually hamari chutti thi sir to matlab mujhe utna dhyan nahi raha. Bataiye sir kya dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan, thoda employee next matlab system branch mein matlab chala gaya kuch kaam karne ke liye.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir, kya keh rahe ho matlab samajh nahi pa raha hoon main.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, boliye boliye. Bol rahe the wo jo training ke liye hum phone kiye the na sir?
Customer: Training ke liye phone kiye us time phone nahi matlab phone nahi uthaya iski wajah se thoda jo employee matlab kis cheez ke liye kiya tha phone main wahi to jaanna chah raha hoon.
Customer: Are sir aapka number jo personal number hai main call kar lungi jab call utha lenge sir aise koi number dijiye.
Executive: Are aap matlab main wahi matlab problem bataiye na sir matlab dikkat kya thi us din jab aapne call kiya tha kis wajah se kiya tha?
Customer: Nahi sir call kiya isliye jo employee jo employment tha training tha na usi ke liye matlab jo pura usi ko sikhana hai jo kaise kya kya kaam karna hai isi ka wajah se call kiya. Achha haan ji haan ji to aap wo apni beti se wo karana chah rahe the sab kuch.
Customer: Haan haan aur usi ko dikhaya matlab jo naya employee hire kiye the wo dekh ke matlab training ke purpose mein call kiye the aur wo dekh ke training us din mera off tha is wajah se to abhi kar sakte hain sir hum.
Customer: Nahi sir kar sakte hain lekin jo aaya tha jo matlab wo kaam dekh kar matlab ka matlab wo training nahi diya na isi ke wajah se wo bol raha hai nahi hum kaam nahi karenge sir kya ho gaya. Are sir ke dekhiye us din sir nahi ho payi training lekin abhi tak dekhiye kuch itni badi cheez nahi hai sir 10 se 15 minute mein sari cheeze samajh mein aa jayengi unko.
Customer: Aur haan sir dekhiye koi itni badi dikkat wali baat nahi hai. Sir ek kaam kijiye aapka number dijiye jo number se hum call kar sakte hain jahan se call hum call kar lenge. Aap jaise haan ji to waise mera number matlab abhi to aapke paas chaliye likh lijiye aap number note kar lijiye mera.
Customer: Achha theek hai. Main abhi aapko whatsapp message kar dunga isi number pe aur baki sir koi aur dikkat to nahi aa rahi hai na mere paas. Sir abhi dikkat nahi hai hum employee de denge to uske baad pata chalega kaun sa kya dikkat chal raha hai kaam to continue karenge. sir ek bar kaam shuru kariye kyunki dekhiye sir aapke area mein na kafi requirements hain inki aur achi khasi standard requirements hain jo aap satisfy kar sakte ho. Hai na? Haan to ek bar aap jo matlab aapne abhi team hire kari thi jaise aap bata rahe ho aapne kisi employee ko hire kiya tha. To unhe matlab aapne thoda bahut to matlab dekha hoga na unhone aapka IndiaMART ka account. Haan system dekha hai uske jo pehle matlab kya hai wo to naya ekdam fresher hai. To isi ke wajah se usko kuch lag raha hai jo kaam nahi kar payenge isi se andar jo system tha usne bola tha jo aap ye kaam kijiye system ko pehle ek din check kar lijiye kaise kya kya tool hai. Hmm. To dekhna hai dekhne ke baad aise lag raha hai jo kaam nahi kar sakte isi ka. Are dekhiye wahi cheez hai ab aap ek cheez batao ab aap bhi jaise aap pehli bar koi nayi cheez dekhoge to usme main mere sath bhi yahi hota hai nahi samajh aati hai cheeze to lagta hai difficult hai. Lekin sir meri baat maniye kafi simple hai ye app jaise phone mein aap app access kar sakte ho kafi aap bhi kar sakte ho in fact. Aasan hai lekin baat hai naya jo tha na to usi ko hum training ke bare mein 10 din mein kaam idhar udhar chala ja raha hai. Help ke liye aap log line pe call call nahi matlab lage hain. Theek hai koi problem nahi hai aapka number change kar dijiye abhi. Haan ji main abhi aapko whatsapp pe ye 0093 end ho raha hai na aapka number sir? Haan haan isi pe aapka personal number dijiye aap call karenge baad mein fatafat aapko dalenge. Haan main us pe hi abhi aapko whatsapp pe text kar deta hoon aur baki sir matlab koi aur dikkat nahi hai na sir actually kya hota hai. Jaise hamare paas haan jaise hamare paas call aati hai to thoda ek matlab ticket wagera open ho jata hai. To sir abhi aapke paas aapke paas mail mein wo aayega ek. Aapki jo mail id hogi na sir. Hello. Haan haan haan sir sun rahe hain. Us pe sir feedback aayega matlab mail pe feedback aayega ki matlab aapko koi IndiaMART se abhi problem to face nahi kar rahe the. To usme aap satisfy kar dijiyega theek hai sir? Haan to theek hai theek hai sir no problem. Haan main abhi aapko bakayda guide bhi kar dunga ek bar kis tarike se wo aayega to abhi main aapko do teen minute baad call karunga to aap bas wo satisfy kar dijiyega okay? Haan sir theek hai sir.
Executive: Okay okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's employee needs training.

- Previous call for training was not answered.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the missed call.

- Executive offered to provide training immediately.

- Executive will send a WhatsApp message.

- Executive will call back in 2-3 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback on mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- training, employee, call, feedback, account
